description:
Chief Commissioner of Police Asano slugs the prime minister and gets fired; his duty had been to capture Lupin, but since he had failed, he now joins forces with Zenigata for the task. Meanwhile Lupin goes to see a Kabuki theatrical play, but he isn`t impressed. But Lupin is accosted by an elderly man there, who wants him to steal the treasures of his own household …
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: The Name of the Operation Is Chuushingura
